title: The Shrouded Isle Sunken Sins-HI2U
description:
bmx! 20
15 [HI2U]

The Shrouded Isle: Sunken Sins (c) Kitfox Games

Release 9th December, 2017

Protection: Steam
Game Size: 1 DISC

Game Type: Indie, Simulation [RELEASE NOTES]

As the high priest, uncover and purge heretics to prepare for the
awakening of your beloved god beneath the waves

The Sunken Sins free DLC features these major improvements:

* An improved inquiry system - discover villager reputations
strategically
* New purification tower game mechanic to cure contagions
* A lengthened campaign - 5 years until Chernobog's awakening instead
of 3
* A new cinematic ending to find
* Additional events & personality traits
* New art and animations
* ....Madness...? Or that which this closed society would deem to
be so

Game is made standalone and includes all previous shizzle! [INSTALL NOTES] 1 Unpack 2 Mount / burn image 3 Install 4 Copy content from 'Crack' folder and replace game dir files 5 Play game 6 If U like it, buy it!

2015
bmx![BAFH]
